description:
Third-party Bilibili music player

Features

  • Play music from Bilibili, YouTube, MusicFree plugin, local files, and AList
  • Playlist subscription
  • Extract song name and search lyric
  • Change theme and custom theme
  • Playlist cloud backup and sync with Azusa Player extension
  • Login on Bilibili and interact with video
  • Multilingual
  • Cache songs
  • Support Android Auto, CarPlay
  • Volume equalization with FFmpeg
  • AB loop playback
  • Word-by-word lyrics
